attributes.action: ensure sex offenders stay on the register for life
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: once a sex offender, always a sex offender. It is wrong that these peadofiles, rapists and molesters have a criminal record for life and are not on the sex offenders register for life. a crime that can lead to imprisonment such as benefit fraud leads to a person having a criminal record for life as well as being exempt from other opportunities in life. it is bad enough these people are not "named and shamed" there is no logic behind a short span of time on the sex offenders register.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
